title: Deepest Conversation We Ever Had
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
description:
Spilling our hearts out, getting covid 3 times, sweet talking my lover, completely disappointing a bride, and more. Thanks for chilling with us this week, love u guys!


Watch our FULL Video Podcast on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmqbxZsoH1YwihrGgU1vPA
